subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees, feeling the pressure of a tight race for the second A.L. wild-card spot, rallied from a three-run deficit to beat the Orioles. But the Yankees had three more players leave the game with injuries.
snippet: The Yankees, feeling the pressure of a tight race for the second A.L. wild-card spot, rallied from a three-run deficit to beat the Orioles. But the Yankees had three more players leave the game with injuries.
